function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of misinformation in social web discussions about articles","Impact":"Increase in dissemination of inaccurate information and confusion among readers","Mitigation":"Fact-checking and verification of information in social web discussions","Technologies":"Natural language processing for analyzing social web discussions","People":"Readers, researchers, and the general public","Owner":"Fact-checking organizations and social media platforms"},{"Description":"Reliance on new data sources for measuring article impact","Impact":"Unreliable or biased measurement of article impact due to unverified or non-standardized data sources","Mitigation":"Validation and standardization of new data sources for article impact measurement","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms and standardized metadata formats","People":"Researchers, publishers, and organizations involved in article impact assessment","Owner":"Standards organizations and academic institutions"},{"Description":"Blurring the line between traditional and alternative metrics","Impact":"Confusion and misinterpretation of article impact due to the merging of different measurement approaches","Mitigation":"Clear communication and education on the differences between traditional and alternative metrics","Technologies":"Educational resources and communication platforms for disseminating information","People":"Researchers, scholars, and individuals involved in article impact assessment","Owner":"Academic institutions and scholarly communities"}]}
